msg: Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Make sure the text line validity is either INVALID or STATIC and the userData is cleared before handing the textLine to the TextLineRecycler.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

When displayAsPassword is changed, TLF's text is reset which reinitializes TLF's textFlow.  Make sure to reinitialize our version of the textFlow and the textFlow generation numbers so that changes to the textFlow will not be dropped in the damageHandler.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

Fix several bugs in the paste code, when displayAsPassword=true and maxChars is true or not.  In particular when the selection is one or more characters, or the insertion point is not after the last character, when pasting.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

When autoSizing, the code in measure resets TLF's vsp and hsp to 0, since it assumes the text will wrap and be visible.  If autoSize with lineBreak="explicit", as Darrell wants to do for the DataGrid cell editor, the text may need to scroll so the scroll positions should not be reset.
Tests run: RichEditableText (the only tests that test autoSize), checkintests
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

If RET text is editable and multiline=false, let TLF's EditManager handle the ENTER key so that if the ENTER is pressed in the middle of a list the proper list handling is done - add a new list item or close off the list, depending on position in the list - and if not in a list, the paragraph is split.
Also fix selectionHightlighting metadata since it was in the same patch.
